free_text.Learning outcomes: The aim of the course is to apply the theory of martingales in the context of mathematical finance. The course provides a detailed study of the mathematical ideas that are used in modern financial mathematics. Moreover, the concept of complete and incomplete markets will be discussed.
free_text.Content: Discrete time models and the Fundamental Theorem of Asset Pricing[br/]Binomial and trinomial model[br/]The Snell envelope, optimal stopping, and American options[br/][br/]Geometric Brownian motion and the Black-Scholes model[br/]Option pricing and hedging[br/]Exotic options[br/][br/]On the theory of (no-)arbitrage in continuous time[br/][br/]Selected topics on[br/]Local- and stochastic volatility models[br/]Lévy driven models [br/]

free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: L'objectif du cours est d'appliquer la théorie de martingale dans le contexte de mathématiques financières. Ce cours fournit une étude détaillée des concepts mathématiques qui sont utilisés par les mathématiques financières modernes. En outre, le cas des marchés complets et incomplets sera abordé.
